publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2255 Patricia Ferguson: National Lottery Bill - UK Legislation—That the Parliament agrees that the provisions in the National Lottery Bill that relate to the executive competence of the Scottish Ministers should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Tavish Scott*

S2M-2255 Patricia Ferguson: National Lottery Bill - UK Legislation—That the Parliament agrees that the provisions in the National Lottery Bill that relate to the executive competence of the Scottish Ministers should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Tavish Scott
